name: Asset Price Lookup
description: Fetches current market prices for stocks, cryptocurrencies, commodities (gold, silver, oil), indices (S&P 500, Nasdaq, Dow), and ETFs. Accepts ticker symbols or common names.
author: @anyloom

examples.prompt: What is the current price of silver?
How much is AAPL stock right now?

query.description: Ticker symbol (AAPL, BTC-USD, GC=F) or common name (silver, bitcoin, S&P 500)
